content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetAccessToken path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/identity/v1/oauth2/token content: sum generate a bearer token
desc authenticate to the stackpath api use the resulting bearer token to authorize other stackpath api calls api credentials can be generated in the stackpath customer portalhttps//controlstackpathcom/
reqbody
identitygetaccesstokenrequest
type obj
props
granttype
type str
desc the oauth2 grant type

currently only the clientcredentials grant type is supported
default clientcredentials
clientid
type str
desc the client id from your api credential
clientsecret
type str
desc the client secret from your api credential

for security reasons client secrets are not stored in stackpaths internal systems after they are generated please record your api client secret after generating it
required true
responses
200
identitygetaccesstokenresponse
type obj
props
accesstoken
type str
desc the access token to be provided as a bearer token in the authorization header to api calls
tokentype
type str
desc the tokens type

currently only bearer tokens are supported
expiresin
type integer
format int32
desc the tokens expiration time measured in seconds
desc a response from a request to generate an oauth2 access token from api credentials

use the resulting token to authorize subsequest stackpath api calls
title: 4_Authentication_GetAccessToken_20.json
